job_overview: A Domestic Worker provides essential services to households, ensuring that the home runs smoothly and remains in good condition. Their duties can vary depending on the employer's needs but generally include cleaning, laundry, cooking, and caring for children or elderly family members. They may also perform administrative tasks or run errands. The role demands trustworthiness, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or under minimal supervision.

They may also perform administrative tasks or run errands. The role demands trustworthiness, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or under minimal supervision.

job_overview: a domestic worker, it requires to know how to clean, iron, wash clothes and plates, and sometimes the Saudi family is looking for someone who can prepare arab food, or is willing to learn it at least, some other families need a babysitter who can care for infants or young babies. Otherwise, the domestic worker has to rest 9 hours a day at least in a decent room, having 3 meals a day. About the required *qualifications for the house maid is just to know how to handle the housework and in addition to knowing some English or Arabic to be able to communicate with and the new environment. *About the expected responsibilities, the domestic worker should be a good and sincere person to live with the Saudi family in a good environment and should intend to do her work in a perfect way and continue her contract for 2 years.

job_overview: From dusting to vacuuming, maids are professionals hired to keep homes or businesses clean. They are also called housekeepers or house cleaners. They might work for companies who are hired by private homeowners to provide cleaning services to residences or by businesses who are seeking to have offices and conference rooms cleaned. Maids also work for hotels and perform scheduled cleanings of rooms, such as replacing linens and emptying wastebaskets. Maids are often individuals who can work independently, adhere to strict schedules, and are detail-oriented time managers who are knowledgeable about using all types of cleaning implements and accessories.
job_description_details: From dusting to vacuuming, maids are professionals hired to keep homes or businesses clean. They are also called housekeepers or house cleaners. They might work for companies who are hired by private homeowners to provide cleaning services to residences or by businesses who are seeking to have offices and conference rooms cleaned. Maids also work for hotels and perform scheduled cleanings of rooms, such as replacing linens and emptying wastebaskets. Maids are often individuals who can work independently, adhere to strict schedules, and are detail-oriented time managers who are knowledgeable about using all types of cleaning implements and accessories.

job_overview: A Female worker is required who has at least completed high school or graduated and is able to speak English and with a recommendation from the guardians to travel to Saudi Arabia. She must have passed the medical requirements and with training provided to her. She will be doing the house chores such as washing clothes (laundry), cleaning the house washing utensils, sweeping the compound, and ensuring that the house is always clean and not messed up. She must be 18 years and above and fit for work.

job_overview: The typical restaurant crew member completes a variety of food preparation, customer transaction and sanitation jobs. A main responsibility during the shift is to take customer orders and process payments. They may also work on preparing and expediting food orders. In between customers, crew members perform cleaning duties, such as clearing tables and sanitizing food preparation areas.
